name: CUBE DUDE - SUTDY PROJECT
description:
A Simples study project what i make in free time my job in a supermarket.

i made this game while im are Studying in one course of my state. Microcamp, Vítoria - Brazil. While in Work in a Supermakert Eight-Hours for day. 

Don't have end the game. it's only a unique level to test my Logic of programmer and you come to the end island, the game restart to begin.

i work in the project for 30m- 1 hour for 3 days. good play.

CONTROLS
  • Jump - Space

PLEASE WRITE CONSTRUCTIVE COMMENTS. I ARE LEARNING!

PORTUGUESE ONLY!

eventually i translate to English the documentation.

What i Learning?

I can make all code, only i need search in the documentation and use the Logic of programmer. I translate the "real life codes" to the game using write logic.

What is Write Logic?

Write Logic its a logic what i write while i talk about de mechanic in real life. so i translate to the game writing again how i should programmer in Unreal or any Engine.

That's help me so much. so, trying you too.

GoodPlay Boy!<div class="open_grepper_editor" title="Edit & Save To Grepper"></div>
